name: Ancestry Genealogical Database File
summary: Learn about .RODX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Ancestry, which was formerly known as Rodokmen, is designed to help you organize your genealogical information and generate family trees. The RODX file is used to store and transfer your genealogical information.
NOTE: The RODX file extension replaced the original .ROD file extension and was replaced by the .RODX extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
